titles.title: MP1039 Colours of day dawn into the mind

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Colours of day dawn into the mind,
the sun has come up, the night is behind.
Go down in the city, into the streets,
and let's give the message to the people we meet:

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
Open your eyes, look into the sky;
the darkness has come, the Son came to die.
The evening draws on, the sun disappears,
but Jesus is living, his Spirit is here:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So light up the fire and let the flame burn,
open the door, let Jesus return.
Take seeds of his Spirit, let the fruit grow,
tell the people of Jesus, let his love show.
